title: In the future will death cease to exist? - Quora

Well in my opinion, you never truly die. I believe we are all made up of energy. Everything you know of in this world and beyond is created by energy and energy is never created nor destroyed but conserved and transferred. When you die, you just experience life from a different perspective but I don’t think you completely cease to exist. In the future I think something will happen to make humans more aware about the process of dying and what it actually means to die and realize there is no you that exists as an individual and we would be able to transcend our normal pattern of thought and accomplish unbelievable things. Immortality is a mindset not a far fetched phenomenon.
